entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.2.1
entry.content: • Fixed ability to reset stage management and change hours

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.2.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.2.3
entry.content:
To Make Alpha-and-Omega happy. Numbers reset on the front, fixed a dialogue menu, and some minor UI changes

What's Changed

  • D100 by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/264
  • Dev by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/265

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.2.2...6.2.3

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.2.4
entry.content: Fixed 2FA and loading issue on frontpage
